item.title: 关于金属熔化的三点思考
item.description:
黄金、白银、铂金，现在还有铜。【原文：

Gold, silver, platinum and now copper.

】

item.title: 美国因批评以色列而制裁联合国人权专家
item.description: 美国对一名调查巴勒斯坦领土人权状况的联合国专家实施制裁，使双方早些时候因被指控有反以色列偏见而要求她下台后的争吵升级。【原文：The US imposed sanctions on a United Nations expert investigating human rights conditions in the Palestinian territories, escalating a feud after earlier calling for her ouster over allegations of anti-Israel bias.】

item.title: 费城联储指数显示美国政治紧张局势升至六年新高
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行公布的一项数据显示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统的税收法案和移民政策引发的冲突中，美国上个月的党派政治紧张局势飙升至六年来的最高点。【原文：Partisan political tensions in the US soared to a six-year high last month, according to a gauge published by the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, amid clashes over President Donald Trump’s tax bill and immigration policies.】

item.title: 俄亥俄州规定数据中心必须为最低能源需求付费
item.description: 俄亥俄州是一个重要的数据中心市场，该州的监管机构规定，无论最终是否需要用电，数据中心都必须为其部分能源需求付费。【原文：Regulators in Ohio, a key data center market, ruled that data centers will have to pay for some of their energy requests regardless of whether the electricity ends up being needed.】

item.title: 濒临破产的新泽西州学区评级被下调
item.description: 托姆斯河地区学区的债券评级被 S&P Global Ratings 下调两级，原因是当地官员讨论了申请破产，而不是通过一项会增加税收的预算。【原文：The Toms River Regional School District had its bond rating slashed two notches by S&P Global Ratings after local officials discussed filing for bankruptcy instead of adopting a budget that would have raised taxes.】

item.title: LightShed 认为苹果应考虑撤换蒂姆-库克的首席执行官职位
item.description: LightShed Partners 的分析师认为，苹果公司应该考虑撤换长期担任首席执行官的蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook），因为这家 iPhone 制造商在人工智能领域的挣扎给公司带来了巨大风险。【原文：Apple Inc. should consider replacing longtime chief executive officer Tim Cook as the iPhone maker’s struggles with artificial intelligence raise significant risks for the company, according to analysts at LightShed Partners.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示委员会对通胀担忧意见不一
item.description: 政策制定者最近一次会议的记录显示，美联储官员在利率前景问题上新出现的分歧主要是由对关税可能如何影响通胀的不同预期所导致的。【原文：The emerging divide among Federal Reserve officials over the outlook for interest rates is being driven largely by differing expectations for how tariffs might affect inflation, a record of policymakers’ most recent meeting showed.】

item.title: 雪佛龙为削减成本，从地区性枢纽转向集中式枢纽
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）正在削减地方和地区业务部门，转而采用更加集中的模式，以提高绩效，并在 2026 年之前削减多达 30 亿美元的成本。【原文：Chevron Corp. is reducing local and regional business units in favor of a more centralized model to improve performance and cut as much as $3 billion of costs by 2026.】

item.title: 亚马逊 "Prime Day "四天活动首日销售额骤降 41
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc）今年进行了一场豪赌，将其一年一度的 Prime Day 夏季促销活动从两天延长到四天，并打赌这一延长将给购物者更多的时间来浏览其庞大的网络商店中的数百万个交易。【原文：Amazon.com Inc took a big gamble this year by expanding its annual Prime Day summer sale to four days from two, betting the extension would give shoppers more time to navigate the millions of deals on its sprawling web store.】

item.title: Goldcrest、Collaborative 领投阿根廷能源初创企业 Unblock 的新一轮融资
item.description: 美国基金 Goldcrest Capital 和 Collaborative Fund 向阿根廷能源技术初创公司 Unblock 种子轮投资了 1350 万美元，该公司将石油和天然气公司多余的天然气转化为计算能力。【原文：US-based funds Goldcrest Capital and Collaborative Fund have invested $13.5 million in a seed round for Argentine energy tech startup Unblock, which converts excess gas from oil and gas companies into computing power.】

item.title: 梅塔公司被法国机构通报可能违反反垄断法
item.description: 法国反垄断监管机构称，已通知 Meta Platforms 公司可能违反了与网络广告业相关的竞争规则。【原文：France’s antitrust regulator said it notified Meta Platforms Inc. of a potential violation of competition rules relating to the online advertising sector.】

item.title: 美国推动软件开发人员采用内存安全语言
item.description: 年轻的非洲裔男性程序员坐在办公室里使用三台显示器编写程序代码。图像聚焦在屏幕上 摄影师：RossHelen/iStockphotoRossHelen/iStockphoto【原文：Young african male programmer writing program code sitting at the workplace with three monitors in the office. Image focused on the screen Photographer: RossHelen/iStockphoto】

item.title: 五年来最差上半年过后，Munis 将卷土重来
item.description: 相对于美国国债而言，市政债券有望从五年来最糟糕的半衰期中复苏，因为丰厚的收益率和低廉的估值吸引了买家。【原文：Municipal bonds are poised to recover from their worst half relative to US Treasuries in five years as juicy yields and cheap valuations attract buyers.】

item.title: 微软在裁员的同时宣称人工智能节省了 5 亿美元开支
item.description: 微软公司热衷于向员工展示人工智能正在如何改变自己的工作场所，即使该公司解雇了数千名员工。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is keen to show employees how much AI is transforming its own workplace, even as the company terminates thousands of personnel.】

item.title: 苹果准备首次升级陷入困境的 Vision Pro 耳机
item.description: 苹果公司计划最早于今年推出售价 3499 美元的 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机的首次升级版，旨在提高这款迟迟未受到消费者青睐的设备的性能和舒适度。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning to introduce its first upgrade to the $3,499 Vision Pro headset as early as this year, aiming to improve the performance and comfort of a device that has been slow to catch on with consumers.】

item.title: OpenAI 完成 65 亿美元收购 Jony Ive 设备初创公司的交易
item.description: OpenAI 已经完成了近 65 亿美元的全股票交易，收购了一家由苹果公司前设计总监乔尼-艾维（Jony Ive）联合创办的人工智能设备初创企业，巩固了这家 ChatGPT 厂商进军硬件市场的步伐。【原文：OpenAI has completed its nearly $6.5 billion all-stock deal to buy an AI device startup co-founded by Apple Inc.’s former design chief Jony Ive, cementing the ChatGPT maker’s push into the hardware market.】

item.title: 私人市场初创企业股东誓言对抗破产
item.description: 倒闭的金融科技初创公司 Linqto 的股东誓言要对抗新管理层对这家陷入困境的公司进行破产重组的努力。【原文：Shareholders of collapsed fintech startup Linqto vowed to fight an effort by its new management to reorganize the troubled company in bankruptcy.】

item.title: 仍有 160 人失踪，救援人员正在搜寻得克萨斯州洪灾受害者
item.description: 德克萨斯州中部的救援人员在大量的瓦砾堆、翻倒的车辆和破碎的房屋中进行了第六天的挖掘，继续搜寻在国庆节周末造成 100 多人死亡的山洪的受害者。【原文：Crews in central Texas are digging through massive piles of debris, overturned vehicles and shattered homes for a sixth day as the search continues for victims of flash floods that killed more than 100 people over the Fourth of July weekend.】

item.title: 花旗银行称南非央行可能下调 7 月份 CPI 目标
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The South African Reserve Bank could lower its inflation target as soon as its policy meeting at the end of this month, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普家族加密货币企业准备投票，数十亿美元在此一举
item.description: 由特朗普家族支持的一种加密代币正逐步接近在交易所公开交易，这有可能为早期的内部人士带来可观的收益，同时也引发了有关蓬勃发展的数字资产市场的治理和投资者保护的新问题。【原文：A crypto token backed by the Trump family is moving closer to trading openly on exchanges, potentially unlocking substantial gains for early insiders, while raising fresh questions about governance and investor protection in the booming digital-asset market.】

item.title: 雅卡里诺两年后卸任马斯克 X 公司首席执行官一职
item.description: 琳达-雅卡里诺两年前受雇于埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk），担任 X 公司首席执行官，在社交媒体平台被马斯克的人工智能初创公司兼并不到三个月后，她即将卸任。【原文：Linda Yaccarino, who was hired two years ago by Elon Musk as chief executive officer of X, is stepping down less than three months after the social-media platform was absorbed by Musk’s artificial intelligence startup.】

item.title: 北约基金投资水下机器人保护海底网络
item.description: 北约正在投资一家专门从事水下管道和船只维修的挪威机器人初创公司，因为北约正在寻求保护海底基础设施的新工具。【原文：NATO is investing in a Norwegian robotics startup specializing in underwater pipeline and vessel repairs, as the alliance seeks fresh tools for protecting subsea infrastructure.】

item.title: 贝莱德的类现金 ETF 让臭名昭著的长期债券交易黯然失色
item.description: 要了解 "T-bill-and-chill "思维如何重塑固定收益投资，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：To see how the “T-bill-and-chill” mindset is reshaping fixed-income investing, look no further than the diverging fortunes of two BlackRock Inc. exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 数字猿出局，Memecoins 入局，NFT 交易量下降 45
item.description: 出：百万美元的猴子肖像。In: memecoin trading - and fast.【原文：Out: million-dollar monkey portraits. In: memecoin trading - and fast.】

item.title: Lavazza 称咖啡涨势已达顶峰，但关税可能带来风险
item.description: 意大利烘焙商 Luigi Lavazza SpA 表示，咖啡零售价格目前已达到顶峰，但仍容易受到关税风险和监管变化的影响。【原文：Coffee retail prices have peaked for now but remain vulnerable to tariff risks and regulatory changes, according to Italian roaster Luigi Lavazza SpA.】

item.title: 餐馆和酒吧称音乐许可成本上升令其不堪重负
item.description:
近年来，表演权组织的数量激增，导致一些场所在支付音乐费用方面举步维艰

。【原文：

The number of performing rights organizations has proliferated in recent years, leaving some venues struggling to pay fees for music

】

item.title: 拥有数十亿赌注的兼并套利投资者期待下一波巨额交易
item.description: 合并套利投资者在其交易策略带来一些上半年的暴利后，终于再次享受到了收益。现在，他们有了新的数十亿赌注，他们需要的只是新一轮的交易浪潮。【原文：Merger arbitrage investors are finally enjoying gains again after their trading strategy resulted in some first-half windfalls. Now, with fresh billions to wager, all they need is a new wave of dealmaking.】

item.title: 三星最新可折叠产品在苹果亮相前瞄准主流市场
item.description: 三星电子公司推出了三款新的可折叠智能手机，力图在苹果公司明年推出首款可折叠手机之前巩固其在该领域的领先地位，并扩大主流市场的吸引力。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. introduced three new foldable smartphones in an effort to cement its grip on the category and broaden mainstream appeal before Apple Inc. debuts its first version next year.】

item.title: Wiz Backer 募集 3 亿美元帮助创业公司员工套现
item.description:
Cyberstarts正在推出一项基金，旨在为投资组合公司提供留住人才的优势

。【原文：

Cyberstarts is launching a fund designed to give portfolio companies an edge in retaining talent

】

item.title: 三星发布重新设计的内置谷歌人工智能的智能手表
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）升级了其智能手表产品线，这是该公司在苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. upgraded its line of smartwatches, its latest attempt to stand out in a crowded consumer electronics category dominated by Apple Inc.】
